DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Characteristics Tissue Side Text Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Characteristics are the distinguishing qualities of a person, object, action, process, or substance._An aggregate of cells with similar or identical specialized characteristics, contributing to the performance of a specific function.  Tissues are parts of organs.  Representative examples include epithelium, lymphoid tissue, and connective tissue.:One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back._Text; the words of something written_Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Characteristics are the distinguishing qualities of a person, object, action, process, or substance._An aggregate of cells with similar or identical specialized characteristics, contributing to the performance of a specific function.  Tissues are parts of organs.  Representative examples include epithelium, lymphoid tissue, and connective tissue.:One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A sample or part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Characteristics are the distinguishing qualities of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Property.preferredDefinition: An aggregate of cells with similar or identical specialized characteristics, contributing to the performance of a specific function.  Tissues are parts of organs.  Representative examples include epithelium, lymphoid tissue, and connective tissue.:One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back._Text; the words of something written_Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Left; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
